title: font embedding
content:
Just a start for now trowing out some topics, feel free to arrange and clean up.

[@font-face](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015113607/http:/typophile.com/wiki/font-face)  
 [Embeded OpenType](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015113607/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Embeded%20OpenType) (EOT)  
 [FontJazz](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015113607/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontJazz)  
 [Typekit](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015113607/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typekit)  
 [sIFR](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015113607/http:/typophile.com/wiki/sIFR)  
 [Flash](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015113607/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Flash)  
 [Portable Document Format](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015113607/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Portable%20Document%20Format) (PDF)

**Discussion:**  
 [Typekit - Web font licensing?](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015113607/http:/typophile.com/node/58482)
author: paul d hunt
